thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 20
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 20 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 20
text:
Aug 10 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily ***
MONDAY, AUGUST 10
HONG KONG, China - Sweden's Riksbank Deputy Governor Cecilia Skingsley and Hong Kong Monetary Authority Deputy Chief Executive Eddie Yue will chair a workshop on experiences of macro prudential policy measures in different countries. Skingsley will also hold a concluding speech at the workshop.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 11 SINGAPORE - Japanese Finance Minister Taro Aso makes a three-day visit to Singapore (to Aug. 11) to attend the country's 50th Independence Day. LUSAKA - Bank of Zambia announces interest rate decision - 0600 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 12 LONDON - Ghana Finance Minister Seth Terkper speaks at Chatham House event on the topic "Guiding Ghana to Economic Recovery: Plans, Implementation and Prospects" - 1100 GMT. MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico publishes quarterly inflation report. THURSDAY, AUGUST 13 SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting - 0100 GMT. MANILA - Central Bank of Philippines holds Monetary Policy Meeting - 0800 GMT. BELGRADE - National bank of Serbia holds executive board meeting to announce interest rates - 1000 GMT. MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico will publish the minutes of July policy meeting - 1400 GMT. PRAGUE - Czech central bank governing board holds meeting, but is not scheduled to discuss monetary policy issues. LIMA - Central bank of Peru holds monetary policy meeting, to set interest rates - 2300 GMT. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile announces rate decision - 2100 GMT.
FRIDAY, AUGUST 14 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank to publish minutes of August policy meeting - 0700 GMT.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 18
WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council meeting. Interest rate announcement not expected. ANKARA - Central bank of Turkey to hold monetary policy committee meeting to set interest rates. JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds board of governors meeting, followed by press conference.
WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 19 WINDHOEK - Central bank of Namibia announces rate decision - 1000 GMT. ANKARA - Central bank of Turkey to hold meeting with economists - 0730 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 20 SEOUL, South Korea - Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Narayana Kocherlakota speaks before the "Macroeconomic Policy and Price Measurement Issues in a Low Inflation Environment" conference - 0020 GMT.
